total_amount_applied.title: Total amount the project applied for

member_state_amount.title: Amount of national and regional funding

fields.name: funding_period_number
fields.title: Funding period number
fields.description: First, second or third funding period.

fields.name: funding_period
fields.title: Funding period
fields.description: One of three official funding period e.g. 2007-2013

fields.name: cci_program_code
fields.title: CCI code
fields.description: CCI codes (e.g. 2014BG05M2OP001) identify operational programs (see codelist).

fields.name: cci_program_title
fields.title: Operational program
fields.description: The operational program matching the CCI code (see codelist)

fields.name: project_id
fields.title: Project ID
fields.description: Unique code of the project (generated if not

fields.name: project_name
fields.title: Project name
fields.description: Name or short description of the project

fields.name: beneficiary_id
fields.title: Beneficiary ID
fields.description: The unique ID of the beneficiary

fields.name: beneficiary_name
fields.title: Beneficiary name
fields.description: Name of the beneficiary (person, company, organisation)

fields.name: beneficiary_postal_code
fields.title: Postal code
fields.description: The postal code of the beneficiary

fields.name: beneficiary_address
fields.title: Address
fields.description: Full address of the beneficiary to be geocoded

fields.name: beneficiary_country_code
fields.title: Country code
fields.description: Two digit ISO-3166 country code of the beneficiary

fields.name: beneficiary_country
fields.title: Country
fields.description: The country of the beneficiary

fields.name: beneficiary_nuts_code
fields.title: NUTS code
fields.description: NUTS code of the beneficiary region

fields.name: beneficiary_nuts_region
fields.title: NUTS region
fields.description: The region matching the NUTS code

fields.name: beneficiary_city
fields.title: City
fields.description: The city of the beneficiary

fields.name: fund_acronym
fields.title: Fund
fields.description: Acronym of the fund (see codelist)

fields.name: fund_name
fields.title: Fund name
fields.description: Full name of the fund (see codelist)

fields.name: theme_code
fields.title: Thematic objective code
fields.description: Code of the thematic objective (see codelist)

fields.name: theme_name
fields.title: Thematic objective
fields.description: Display name of the thematic objective (see codelist)

fields.name: priority_number
fields.title: Priority number
fields.description: Priority number of the grant agreement (see codelist)

fields.name: priority_label
fields.title: Priority
fields.description: Description of the priority number of the grant agreement (see codelist)

fields.name: starting_date
fields.title: Starting date of the project
fields.description: Starting date of the project

fields.name: completion_date
fields.title: Completion date of the project
fields.description: Completion date of the project

fields.name: approval_date
fields.title: Approval date of the project
fields.description: Date that the project is approved

fields.name: first_payment_date
fields.title: Date of the first payment
fields.description: The data at which the first payment was made (pre-financing)

fields.name: final_payment_date
fields.title: Date of the final payment
fields.description: The date on which the final payment was made

fields.name: total_amount
fields.title: Total cost of the project
fields.description: Total cost of project

fields.name: total_amount_applied
fields.title: Total amount the project applied for
fields.description: Total amount that project applied for

fields.name: total_amount_eligible
fields.title: Total eligible expenditure
fields.description: Total eligible expenditure

fields.name: member_state_amount
fields.title: Amount of national and regional funding
fields.description: Amount that is awarded from national funds

fields.name: third_party_amount
fields.title: Third party funding
fields.description: The total amount that is additional to the action over third party funding

fields.name: eu_cofinancing_amount
fields.title: EU co-financing
fields.description: The amount of co-financing from the EU

fields.name: european_investment_bank_amount
fields.title: European Investment Bank financing
fields.description: The amount of co-financing received from the European Investment Bank (EIB)

fields.name: beneficiary_url
fields.title: Beneficiary website
fields.description: URL of the beneficiary (or project)

fields.name: project_description
fields.title: Project description
fields.description: A paragraph description of the project
